verbs.description: [ARG1: i] [V: got] [ARG2: transformed into emilia clarke not many people can wear their dark brown hair in shaggy curtain bangs one day a sleek icy blonde lob the next and have us bringing both photos to our colorist for inspiration] but emilia clarke is the exception to that rule her beauty looks are both dramatic emilia clarke hbo daenerys targaryen mother of dragons
